title: How Blockchain Became Myanmar’s Secret Weapon Against a Totalitarian Regime
creator: Hein Htet Kyaw
description: Myanmar has been under totalitarian regimes with state socialist cooperative policies since the 1960s. The military junta rebranded themselves as “State Peace and Development Council – SPDC” and started their roadmap to transit the economy from state cooperative socialist economy to neoliberal market economy. The NUG (National Unity Government of Myanmar) interim government introduced a [blockchain-based payment platform] called "[NUGPAY]".
